posts.post_content:
Willing to pay strong prices for my missing cards or trade liberally from my large pre-1920 advertising and collectible tobacco most everything accumulation. 

N162 Goodwin - trying to finish VG/X and better graded set (need 10 cards) and a low grade set with relatively clean fronts and BD (need 7 cards)

N43 Ginter - need about 13 low grade commons

and

Wood vg/x or better

and

vg/x or better Edwards (boxer) - IT'S THE LAST CARD I NEED SO I WILL LIKELY SIGNIFICANTLY OVERPAY :-)

N184 Kimball - looking for about 15 cards for the 75 card master set

N36 - large Ginter Indians - need about 20 low grade examples.
